text:
[Verse]
Coffee cup's steam rise high
Morning sun warm and bright
People buzz can't deny
New day feels just right

[Verse 2]
Barista calls my name
Latte art just the same
Simple joys no need fame
Live life like it's a game

[Chorus]
Coffee shop days
Warm and cozy place
Love the way it stays
In this little space

[Verse 3]
Laptop open and wide
Stories waiting inside
Dreams blend with my stride
Nothing here I can't hide

[Bridge]
Croissants flaky and gold
Stories that I've been told
Laughter never gets old
In this world uncontrolled

[Verse 4]
Moments in every sip
Memories never slip
Window seat road trip
Imagination's grip
title: Coffee Shop Days
